altername_name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 14 - Nante Tantei Idol - The Jigsaw Puzzle
name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 14: Nantettantei Idol: The Jigsaw Puzzle
overview: Simple Characters 2000 Series vol.14 - Nante Tantei Idol: The Jigsaw Puzzle is a big collection of unlockable pictures and different images of the characters of the manga series "Nante Tantei Idol" that can be unlocked playing different jigsaw puzzle games. There are different jigsaw puzzle modes: 4x4, 6x6, 8x8, 10x10. There are 2 game modes: Jigsaw & Time attack modes.
